## polyArea2 variable

Interprets given points as closed 2D polygon and computes its signed area. If result is negative, the polygon is clockwise.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
polyArea2: (pts: import("@thi.ng/api").ArrayLikeIterable<number>[]) => number
```
